name: The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings Enhanced Edition
notes: Gallium Nine is for AMD and INTEL GPU's only Important: You must supply the exe and bin files yourself. If launcher doesn't work first time run the executable in "drive_c/GOG Games/The Witcher 2 Enhanced Edition/bin/witcher2.exe" launcher should now work "drive_c/GOG Games/The Witcher 2 Enhanced Edition/Launcher.exe" If you get an import DLL error, open a console using winetricks and enable GalliumNine with this command "wine ninewinecfg"

files.setup: N/A:Select the game's setup file from GOG

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the game's setup file from GOG
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/The Witcher 2 Enhanced Edition/Launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9_36
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9_39
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: gdiplus
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet40
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2010 win7
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /nogui
    description: Installing Witcher 2
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: galliumnine
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: ninewinecfg
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Setup
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/The Witcher 2 Enhanced Edition/bin/Configurator.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    __GL_THREADED_OPTIMIZATIONS: '1'
wine:
  Desktop: true
